data.subTitle: MERN stack magician, DevOps Enthusiast, and part-time debugger. If you see me staring at my screen, I’m either coding… or questioning my life choices!
aboutDescription: Hello! I'm Sachin, a budding full-stack web developer.
I've been captivated by the world of technology. Armed with a Bachelor in Computer Applications, I've honed my skills in the MERN stack, Python, and C++.
Currently, I'm expanding my expertise with a focus on Web Developement and DevOps at NIT JAMSHEDPUR (MCA).Beyond coding, I find joy in the playing Cricket.
In recent years, I've dived into programming, crafting a robust front-end stack,backend and creating projects that address real-world challenges.
Juggling design, development, and education, I am trying to dive deep into coding and make a real difference.
If you're intrigued by what I'm working on, explore my portfolio below, and let's connect for potential collaborations!

projects.description: The Dispensary Management System is a full-stack web application designed to streamline dispensary operations, including appointment scheduling, inventory management, and medicine distribution. It features role-based access control, secure JWT authentication, and a React dashboard, deployed with optimized performance and security

MockMaster is an intelligent mock interview platform designed to help users prepare for technical interviews by simulating real-world scenarios. It offers customized interview questions across various domains, providing detailed feedback and explanations to enhance learning and boost confidence

The ASCII Art Header File is a C++ library that mimics popular Python libraries for generating ASCII art. It allows users to display text in various styles by converting each letter of a word into unique, visually appealing ASCII representations, providing an easy and customizable way to create text-based art in C++ programs

The SMS Detection system, made using machine learning, classifies and filters incoming text messages for spam, phishing, and other malicious content. It ensures real-time classification with customizable sensitivity, improving security and user experience

data.contactParagraph: I'm currently open to work and get involved in new projects, so get in touch if you'd like to Hire me or work together.
